strings.Value: "I should have guessed that this unbearable minion, Trebricent, would be chief among Irovetti's bards! I remember being sickened by his verses even back at the Academy..."
"Another useful idiot who chose the wrong ruler."
"For the life of me, I can't understand it. â€” Was he really that crazy about Irovetti? Or was he so used to licking his boots that couldn't straighten up even before his death?"
"I thought his kind would be scared, wouldn't want to die. Would betray his master and beg to join us. But he fought until the end."
